project.name: Scholara11y
project.description: To address the challenges researchers face in following various accessibility guidelines when creating figures for academic papers, this project integrates existing guidelines and proposes an optimal combination of standards. While specific publisher requirements should always be prioritized, this standard serves as a practical guide for cases where no specific guidelines are mandated, enabling more efficient academic communication.
